txt.en: Saija has two tasks she requires of you before she imparts her knowledge.

'To the south and west, Ice-giants have come down from the mountains, threatening all who hunt in those lands. Go forth and meet them, drive them from the lands of the Lossoth. Such a deed will help to prove your loyalty.\n\n'You may find them easier to deal with if you draw them to the hot springs that spout up within their camp. When you have completed this task, return to me for further instruction.'

Ice-giants can be found south and west of Näky-kolo.\n\nSaija has tasked you with defeating the Ice-giants that have come down from the mountains.  She also suggests pulling them onto hot springs to weaken them.
'Only a [placeholder] of great valour would dare to face such mighty and terrible creatures. You have proved your prowess.'
Saija is at Näky-kolo north west of Kuru-leiri.\n\nHaving defeated the Ice-giants, you should return at once to Saija.

'To the south and west, Ice-giants have come down from the mountains, threatening all who hunt in those lands. Go forth and meet them, drive them from the lands of the Lossoth. Such a deed will help to prove your loyalty.\n\n'You may find them easier to deal with if you draw them to the hot springs that spout up within their camp. When you have completed this task, return to me for further instruction.'
'Only an Elf of great valour would dare to face such mighty and terrible creatures. You have proved your prowess.'
'You are mighty to face such creatures as the Ice-giants.'
Book 13, Chapter 8: A Test of the Cold
